pkgmetadata.longdescription: # Njinn Worker## InstallationYou can install the Njinn Worker from [PyPI](https://pypi.org/project/njinn_worker/): pip install njinn-workerThe worker is supported on Python 3.7 and above.## UsageWorker registration njinn-worker <registration_token>If it's already registered you can run the worker by calling njinn-worker## DockerThe Njinn Worker is also available from dockerhub as njinn/worker. You can also set the registration key via the environment variable `NJINN_WORKER_TOKEN`
